briefTitle: Clinical Endpoint Study of Ivermectin 1% Cream
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Design, Multiple-Site Clinical Study to Evaluate the Therapeutic Equivalence and Safety of Ivermectin Cream 1% (Actavis Laboratories UT, Inc.) to SoolantraTM (Ivermectin) Cream 1% (Galderma) in the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Papulopustular Rosacea
summary: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-design, multiple-site clinical study to evaluate the therapeutic equivalence and safety of ivermectin cream 1% (Actavis Laboratories UT, Inc.) to SoolantraTM (ivermectin) cream 1% (Galderma) in the treatment of moderate to severe papulopustular rosacea.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 12 in the Number of Inflamed (Papules/Pustules) Lesions of Rosacea.
